p: The tested fungal isolates namely: Candida tropicalis (ATCC 66029) was obtained from Nigeria Institute of Medical Research, Lagos. Candida albicans, Penicillium notatum, Aspergillus fumigatus, A. niger, A. flavus, Trichophyton rubrum, Trichophyton violceum and Trichophyton mentagrophytes were collected from Department of Medical Microbiology Laboratory, Federal Medical Centre, Ido-Ekiti, Nigeria.
